languages.text: {n}Один из бандитов достает нож — видимо, собираясь взять на себя собаку. Но замирает. Позади вы слышите знакомый голос:{/n} "Эта девушка скроена по правилам. Оставьте ее. Или познакомлю с моими ножницами".

{n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."
languages.original_text: {n}Один из бандитов достает нож — видимо, собираясь взять на себя собаку. Но замирает. Позади вы слышите знакомый голос:{/n} "Эта девушка скроена по правилам. Оставьте ее. Или познакомлю с моими ножницами".

traits.locale_text: {n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come to meet my shears."

{n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come to meet my shears."

{n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my shears."

{n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my shears."

{n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."

{n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."

languages.text: {n}其中一名土匪掏出一把短刀，显然打算攻击格雷托。但随后，他的动作突然停了下来。你听到某个声音从你身后传来，这个声音你很熟悉。{/n}“这个姑娘的发型很漂亮。赶紧放开她，否则就尝尝剪刀的滋味吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."

traits.locale_text: {n}其中一名土匪掏出一把短刀，显然打算攻击格雷托。但随后，他的动作突然停了下来。你听到某个声音从你身后传来，这个声音你很熟悉。{/n}“这个姑娘的发型很漂亮。赶紧放开她，否则就尝尝剪刀的滋味吧。”

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフに挑もうとしたのか、盗賊の一人がナイフを抜く。だがすぐに、その場で凍りついたように動きを止めた。背後から声がした。その声には聞き覚えがあった。{/n}「この女のハサミ裁きは本物だ。手を出すな。さもなくば、俺のハサミが裁くだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフに挑もうとしたのか、盗賊の一人がナイフを抜く。だがすぐに、その場で凍りついたように動きを止めた。背後から声がした。その声には聞き覚えがあった。{/n}「この女のハサミ裁きは本物だ。手を出すな。さもなくば、俺のハサミが裁くだろう」

languages.text: {n}Uno de los bandidos saca un cuchillo con la aparente intención de atacar al cibermastín, pero se detiene en seco. Oyes detrás de ti una voz que te resulta familiar:{/n} «Esta muchacha tiene madera. Dejadla en paz u os las veréis con mis tijeras».
languages.original_text: {n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los bandidos saca un cuchillo con la aparente intención de atacar al cibermastín, pero se detiene en seco. Oyes detrás de ti una voz que te resulta familiar:{/n} «Esta muchacha tiene madera. Dejadla en paz u os las veréis con mis tijeras».

languages.text: {n}Haydutlardan biri, anlaşılan siber mastifi deşmek üzere bıçak çekiyor ama sonrasında olduğu yerde donakalıyor. Arkandan tanıdık bir sesin geldiğini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Bu kadında iş var. Ona bulaşırsanız makasımla tanışırsınız."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haydutlardan biri, anlaşılan siber mastifi deşmek üzere bıçak çekiyor ama sonrasında olduğu yerde donakalıyor. Arkandan tanıdık bir sesin geldiğini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Bu kadında iş var. Ona bulaşırsanız makasımla tanışırsınız."

languages.text: {n}L'un des bandits tire un couteau, apparemment dans le but d'attaquer le cyber-mastiff, mais s'immobilise brusquement. Vous entendez s'élever derrière vous une voix connue :{/n} « Je trouve cette femme assez élégante. Laissez-la tranquille si vous ne voulez pas avoir affaire à mes ciseaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des bandits tire un couteau, apparemment dans le but d'attaquer le cyber-mastiff, mais s'immobilise brusquement. Vous entendez s'élever derrière vous une voix connue :{/n} « Je trouve cette femme assez élégante. Laissez-la tranquille si vous ne voulez pas avoir affaire à mes ciseaux. »

languages.text: {n}Einer der Banditen zieht ein Messer, um den Cyber-Mastiff zu attackieren, erstarrt aber in der Bewegung. Du hörst hinter dir eine vertraute Stimme.{/n} "Diese Frau gefällt mir. Lasst sie in Ruhe, oder ihr macht Bekanntschaft mit meiner Schere."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the bandits pulls out a knife, apparently planning to take on the cyber-mastiff, then stops dead. You hear a voice behind you, one you recognise:{/n} "This woman has the right cut. Leave her alone, or come meet my scissors."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer der Banditen zieht ein Messer, um den Cyber-Mastiff zu attackieren, erstarrt aber in der Bewegung. Du hörst hinter dir eine vertraute Stimme.{/n} "Diese Frau gefällt mir. Lasst sie in Ruhe, oder ihr macht Bekanntschaft mit meiner Schere."
